page.title: 12Mayor's Inauguration
page.content: Councillor Roberts said that the lasting memory of his year had given him a host of new and dear friends. The Mayor then confirmed the appointment of Councillor B.A. Gibbon, Deputy Mayor and the Town Clerk called upon him to sign his Declaration of Acceptance of Office. The Mayor invested Councillor Gibbon with his Robe and Badge of Office. The Mayoress, Mrs. Gaynor Rees, then invested the Deputy Mayoress, Mrs. Margaret Gibbon, with her badge of Office. The Mayor thanked everyone again for attending the meeting.The Reverend Gwilym Williams then closed the meeting with the benediction. { Neil R. Thomas { and { Nicholas J. Stanford
